summary: Diff adds a new Motoko backend actor with product catalog CRUD (admin-only) and Stripe session operations, plus a new React storefront with routing, cart, Stripe success/cancel pages, and an admin UI (products + Stripe setup). Some required backend API/role-bootstrap pieces are not evidenced in the diff, and a few extra features were added that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes query methods to list products and fetch a product by id.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend shows a query method to list products (getProducts) but no query method to fetch a single product by id is present in the provided backend diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Documented/configurable way to set the initial admin Principal (the requester) so they have admin permissions after signing in with Internet Identity.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows admin checks via AccessControl and an actor initialization call using a URL secret token (_initializeAccessControlWithSecret), but it does not evidence configuration of an initial admin Principal as requested.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile creation/storage flow (name profile) with a mandatory profile setup modal and related backend profile APIs.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for user profiles or a required onboarding modal; this is additional functionality beyond storefront/Stripe/admin requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin bootstrap/initialization via a secret URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and actor method _initializeAccessControlWithSecret.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies initial admin via a configurable Principal; it does not request a secret-token-based bootstrap mechanism via URL parameters.
